headline: Harris Prepares for Debate Night As Stakes and Expectations Rise
text: The last time Kamala Harris stepped onto a debate stage, her Democratic primary campaign was sputtering to a close — running out of money, trailing badly in the polls and fading as a force on policy issues. She ranked sixth in speaking time at that November 2019 debate; she dropped out of the race two weeks later.
snippet: She is viewed as a gifted cross-examiner whose instincts for televised verbal combat are one of her greatest political strengths, but this is a new challenge.
